content:
Photo Chief

During the annual breast cancer awareness game the Texas AM Mens Basketball team played the South Carolina Gamecocks and lost in a close match  PERIOD The team sported a white and pink jersey with matching pink shoes to support the cause PERIOD Andre Gordon shot  points while Henry Coleman caught a total of  rebounds PERIOD Texas AM will be on the road next week to play Tennessee PERIOD
